NEWS LETTER
What can i say. you guys are incredible! I owe my life to you, being able to live my life like a normal human being, thanks to your wonderful research and dedication, you are fantastic! You feel like long last family members. I would like to congratulate you on this tremendous achviement, I really want to thank you out of the whole of my heart, its a miracle to, at long last, meet the people that are absolutely the co leaders in MS research. You guys deserve the Nobel prize! Weldone! Keep up the good work! Go, go, go! Don"t stop. I would very much like to get involved in this fantastic venture, its indeed a privilege to communicate with you guys.I wish you all the best for the future! I really don't have enough words to show my utmost gratitude. Bless you all, may God be with you all the way and support you with this fantastic mission with all He have to give and lots more! I am now calling upon you as the "incredibles". May you flourish with blessings and achieve new hights for ever more. Absolutely awesome!
Your a sincere good friend
Nils Bergh
The first time I heard of Elaine DeLack and Prokarin was on a TV show called, "Miracle Cures," which was hosted by Della Reese. When I saw the show, chills immediately ran down my spine and as an intuitive I knew this was a sign that Prokarin and Elaine DeLack could be an actual miracle for me. And I'm so happy to report that my intuition was right on target. You see, I was also diagnosed with relapsing/remitting Multiple Sclerosis in 1991. And as the years ventured on, and as my illness progressed the less I was capable of doing. So much so, that after three years I was more or less housebound. But fortunately, my sad story is a thing of the past, because for almost three years I've been fortunate enough to be using Prokarin and I am not exaggerating when I say it gave me back my life. No more am I housebound and now can drive again. Take walks again...go shopping again...all the things we all take for granted when we're healthy. Well, now thanks to Prokarin, I'm healthy again. Thanks to Prokarin and Elaine DeLack...The woman that wouldn't take no for an answer and in doing so is helping and giving back so many of us our lives.
To read Elaine's story is a gift itself..So, be good to yourself and pick up a copy and sit back and go on a miraculous reading journey through Elaine's life.
By: MaryRose Occhino
Author of "Beyond These Four Walls"
